function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Obsolete office surveillance systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees suppressing disease symptoms","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Surfaces retaining viruses can become frequent touch points","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Microbiological contaminants in water tanks during building closures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and adherence to covid-19 safety precautions in workplaces","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees hesitant to return to touch-based offices","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of infection from contaminated office surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for efficient airflow and room sanitation","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in workplaces leading to the spread of covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in open office layouts facilitating viral transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-speed elevators in multistory office buildings becoming places of high infection spread propensity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 virus in closed office spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respiratory spread of the novel coronavirus under low temperature and low relative humidity rh conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential rapid spread of covid-19 in office workplaces due to close proximity of workers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control efforts leading to continuous exposure of workers to recirculated infected air in workplace environments.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health and social workers have higher risk infectivity based on proximity and aggregation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers in different sectors cannot be effectively protected from covid-19 by a single safety guideline or protocol","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers must receive timely communications about updated guidelines and protocols","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in closed workplace environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to maintain safe working distance in certain industries , meat processing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrinsic work patterns in the health sector leading to high vulnerability to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective workplace regulations and measures","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to regularly assess workplace hazards","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor climate-controlled environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of covid-19 health regulations in workplaces","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited scope of literature review may lead to oversight of important information regarding covid-19 transmission in office environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on information from blog sites may introduce bias or inaccuracies in the understanding of covid-19 transmission and prevention in office environments.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission dynamics and preventive measures in office settings may lead to inadequate protection against covid-19 transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for infection spreading in office buildings and workplaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficiencies in office buildings and layouts contributing to infection spreading propensity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate covid-19 regulations and guidelines in offices","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sector-specific pandemic control regulations and guidelines","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacies in building sustainability ratings and environmental impact assessments","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective spatial distribution of living spaces for epidemic control","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Customers’ preferences redirected from hypermarkets to decentralized commercial places due to fear of covid-19, leading to increased crowding in smaller spaces.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temptation to violate quarantine orders due to emotional distress and motivation to comply with quarantine.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining physical distancing between partners and roommates in small apartments increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor spaces for socialization and physical distancing","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity increases the likelihood of disease transmission, especially in shared dwellings and apartment housing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled socialization on balconies","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to daylight, nature, and thermal comfort due to socioeconomic status","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of information sharing and collaboration between technical managers in healthcare facilities","category":"Communication and Collaboration risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation and auditing of current bacs involves physical interaction with building systems and devices.","category":"Health and Safety risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of bacs design and functionalities improvements involves on-site work and potential exposure to contagions.","category":"Health and Safety risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex equations and technical language make it difficult for non-experts to understand the risk assessment.","category":"Communication and Collaboration risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intrusion of technology into immediate workspace","category":"Technology risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of inter-institutional collaboration","category":"Communication and Collaboration risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation spread about the disease","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak community-based crisis risk management","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
